text: Jwalakwe ni Ajula jwaakumpanjilaga kaoneche kenu n'di nâ€™nyitumbo yaakutiji pakusaka (kuti m'be walume kapena wakongwe, waswela kapena wapiliu, walewu kapena wajipi, wakwimbala kapena wachilenje). Pangali nnungu jwine (jwakuwajilwa kun'galagatila) ikaweje Jwelepejo, Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwalunda lwakusokoka
